setup.already: You have started setup wizard already. Please finish or cancel the setup you started first.
setup.unauthorized: The giveaway could not be started because the bot's permissions were insufficient to create a raffle on this channel.
setup.channel.gone: The giveaway couldn't created. Couldn't find the specified channel. Suddenly disappeared...

setup.success: The giveaway has created successfully! The giveaway you started has published in the {0} channel...

skip.success: ** {0}. ** step successfully ** skipped **. The next step has been taken.

message: If you want to **exit** from wizard, you can write `iptal`, `cancel` or `exit` to chat. Let's move on to the setup.
**Step 1:** Firstly let's determine in which channel the giveaway going to be.
`Please do not forget to mention a text channel on the server that the bot can access.`

channel.invalid: Please mention a valid text channel.

validator.success: Successful! The giveaway channel has determined as {0}. Let's move on the next stage.

message: **Step 2:** Let's determine how many winners going to be.
`Please do not forget that you must specify a numeric and a number between 1 and 20.`

validator.success: Very good! In this giveaway, you are going to make a total of **{0}** people smile :slight_smile:!

message: **Step 3:** Now, let's determine a time to the giveaway.

`Do not forget, the time must be minimum 1 minute, maximum 60 day. While determining the time, you must use specifies time term like m (minute), h (hour), d (day). While using this you can write the time with or without whitespaces. Do not forget to, only one type of time can be used.`

validator.success: Congratulations! The giveaway time has determined to **{0}**.

message:
**Step 4:** let's set a giveaways color.
:loudspeaker: If you want to **skip** this step, please write `pas`, `skip` to the chat.
`Remember only, only can write the English name or hexadecimal code of a color.`

validator.success: Good choice! The giveaway color is set to **{0}**.

message:
**Step 5:** If people need to join a certain server to participate in your raffle, you can determine which servers are in this section. Let's get to work.
:loudspeaker: If you want to **skip** this step, please write `pas`, `skip` to the chat.
`necessarily To specify the servers to enter, type the invite links of the servers, separating them with a comma. Remember, you can write maximum {0} servers and {1} must be in all the servers you specify.`

validator.success: All right! Total **{0}** join the server imperative added.

message:
**Step 6:** If people should have a specified role to attend to the giveaway, you can choose the roles that people should have. *Elite giveaways for your elite members*
:loudspeaker: If you want to **skip** this step,  please write `pas`, `skip` or `geç` to the chat.
`Write the name of the roles or mentions, with commas between them in the chat to decide the obligatory roles. Do not forget you can write maximum {0} role and people that will join, should have all of the roles.`

validator.success: Successful! People that want to join the giveaway must have all of the **{0}** roles.

message:
**Step 7:** What about to make the prize bigger? To make the person that won the giveaway, different from others, you can give role. *Buddy this is so cool!*
:loudspeaker: If you want to **skip** this step,  please write `pas`, `skip` or `geç` to the chat.
`Write the name of the roles or mentions, with commas between them in the chat to decide the roles that will be given as prize. Do not forget you can write maximum {0} role. The giveaway winners are given all of the roles that you set.`

validator.success: Fascinating! The **{0}** roles will be given to the winner of the giveaway as prize.

message: **Step {0}:** Finally, let's determine the giveaway's prize (At the same time it going to use as title)
`Do not forget to the prize's maximum length can be 255 character.`

validator.success: That's it! The giveaway title and prize has determined to {0}.
